mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_src_reply (src_id, reply_text, reply_status) VALUES (#{srcId}, #{replyText}, #{replyStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT reply_id, src_id, reply_text, reply_writer, user_name AS userName, r.reply_regdate, r.reply_update FROM tbl_src_reply r, tbl_user m WHERE r.reply_writer = m.user_id AND src_id=#{srcId} ORDER BY reply_id
